title: I dreamed that my sister died and came back to life in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my sister died and came back to life in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Dreams are stories and images that our minds create during sleep, and they can be real or imaginary, and they can be pleasant, beautiful, or disturbing. Islamic law says that true visions are those that are attained only by honest servants and anything less than that is meaningless. In this article, we learn about a dream in which my sister died and came back to life in a dream by Ibn Sirin. I dreamed that my sister died and came back to life in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees in Dreaming that his sister died, and he came back to life, and asked him for money for food, this is a sign of the financial loss that the fortuneteller will suffer in the coming days, and it also shows the dead person coming back to life again. His need to pray and distribute alms these days, and seeing the dead sister come back to life, which indicates many problems and fears that accompany the insight. See also: The interpretation of the dream of seeing a snake bite in a dream for an unmarried and married woman according to Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of the dream of a sister dying by drowning in a dream according to Ibn Sirin differed. Scientists determine their point of view on dream interpretation, according to Freud and those who followed him. He considers these dreams to be subconscious and subconscious expressions of desires. As for the psychologist Calvin Hall, he considered that dreams are a reflection of what we go through in our waking lives, and in these points, we interpret a dream that my sister died and came back from life in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing the death of a sister drowning in a dream for an unmarried girl means that her wedding date is approaching. In the next few days. As for the dream of the death of a sister drowning in the sea and her grief over him and his accompanying crying, it is evidence of the crises and problems that the dreamer is going through. If a married woman dreams that her sister is drowning in a dream, crying and being slapped, then this vision indicates the sorrows and misfortunes that the dreamer is suffering from. If this vision relates to a man and he sees in his dream that his sister died by drowning, then it is a sign that he has been engaged more than once and has failed in all of them, and he may not get married these days. See also: I dreamed that I cried a lot.. Interpretation of seeing intense crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a sister dying while she was Alive and crying over her in a dream by Ibn Sirin The interpretation of dreams helps in the psychological analysis of a person and provides a clear explanation for understanding his personality.Psychologist Freud believed that dreams are the way to access the unconscious activities of the mind. In these points we explain the interpretation of the dream in which my sister died and came back to life. Seeing the sister’s death while she is alive and the dreamer crying over her in the dream means that the dreamer will soon defeat her enemies. As for crying and intense crying in the dream of the sister’s death, there are evil people trying to discipline and harm her. Likewise, in If she sees her crying for her sister after she died while she was alive, this is a sign that her sister is affected by the evil eye and the envy of the people around her who are very close to her. Also, dreaming about the death of a living sister and crying over her is evidence of the disputes and problems that the sister will fall into in the coming days. See also Interpretation of seeing a dead person giving gold in manna

title: Learn about the interpretation of the accident in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about an accident during sleep. The vision of a dream varies from one person to another and varies in different places. Arab scholars and dream interpreters say that a vision in a dream can be a good or unpleasant vision depending on the dreamer’s position, so the dreamer must interrupt his vision. As it is until it reaches its correct and accurate interpretation. Dream of an AccidentIf a man sees in a dream that he is driving a car and the car suddenly overturns, this indicates that there are problems and difficulties in this person’s life, but they will end soon. If a man sees in a dream that he saw an accident on the road and people died in front of him This indicates that he paid the debts that this dreamer suffered from. The accident in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing an accident in a dream that it is often an unpleasant vision and in some dreams it is a good vision: If a man sees in a dream an accident about himself and that he died on the road This is evidence of the dreamer’s long life. If a married woman sees the accident in a dream, this is a sign of the problems and difficulties that this woman faces, but they will end soon. Interpretation of Dreams, Car AccidentIf a man sees in a dream a car accident and someone he knows dies in this accident, this is evidence of The longevity of that person. If one girl sees in a dream an accident on the road and there are no dead people, this is evidence that this girl has survived a disaster. Interpretation of a dream about an accident To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian dream interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations By leading interpretation scholars. Ibn Sirin presented different interpretations of this vision. The first interpretation: The dreamer feels a sense of dread about life as a whole. He may become somewhat confused by professional, family or marital matters if he supports the family and children in waking life and because he does not live reassured, it begins to appear in his dreams with accidents and a feeling of fear during the vision, and it may come from him screaming. As a result of the horror he experienced in the details of the dream, he wakes up panting from the cruelty of the scene he saw. The second interpretation: Many of us find that we are clearly flawed when it comes to bearing burdens and responsibilities, so this interpretation clearly discusses this problem, as the dreamer dreams of accidents as a metaphor for not His ability to bear any responsibility. Reaching him, as if he were the head of a family, the misfortune would be doubled and this would cause him a major imbalance in his married life, so this vision is an indication that he should be aware of his mistakes and immediately seek to correct them. they. That he does not lose more things than he lost, the third interpretation relates to a circumstance or situation that happened to the dreamer and caused his dream, where one of the women said that she was going to a place with her husband and children and they came across a large car and this caused their car. She turns over and from today she dreams of a car accident and wakes up from her sleep in a state of extreme panic. It takes a long time to calm down, so maybe dreams about accidents are based on reality, maybe they have already happened and it's giving him nightmares

title: Interpretation of a dream about preparing for a wedding in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about preparing to go to a wedding, a wedding is one of the happy occasions that we are happy to go to, especially if this occasion is for a relative or friend. We feel happy when we share this happy occasion, and we wish them happiness in their upcoming married life, and we may see in a dream that we are preparing To go to a wedding and we want to know the interpretation of this dream and what it indicates, and what are the consequences of this dream it indicates and here we will explain to you its interpretation of the dream of preparing to go to a wedding.Interpretation of the dream of preparing for a wedding for single peopleMarriage and stability are among the dreams of a single girl who desires and seeks to achieve it in reality and may see herself In a dream, she prepares and prepares for her marriage, and here we list the interpretation of the dream of preparing for the wedding for single people. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is preparing to attend a happy occasion, this indicates the arrival of happy occasions in the coming days. Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees in a dream that she is preparing and preparing to attend a happy occasion, this indicates the imminent fulfillment of her desired desires and dreams. But if The unmarried girl was facing problems in reality. If she saw herself in a dream preparing for a happy occasion, this indicates that she will get rid of problems soon. Here is evidence that the marriage of one of the dreamer’s relatives or one of her friends is approaching. And if the unmarried girl sees that she is preparing to attend a happy occasion and that The atmosphere around her is going well, so let this be a sign to her that her affairs in reality will go well in the future. See also: Interpretation of dreams about sudden visits in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about preparation. Suitable for a married woman. Women like to dress and prepare for occasions, especially happy ones, to show off their beauty and elegance. In front of people and to be in the most beautiful shape in front of them, and here we will talk about the interpretation of the dream of preparing for it. Suitable for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is preparing for a happy occasion, this is a sign of goodness that will come to her and her husband. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she is marrying someone who is already her husband, then this indicates that she will give birth soon. As for the married woman who saw In a dream, she is preparing to attend a happy occasion. There is a son here in reference to her son’s marriage. However, if she does not know the groom, this is evidence that things will be easy and that problems will be solved. Interpretation of a dream about preparing to attend a wedding for divorced people. People dream many dreams during their sleep, and a divorced woman may see In her dream, she is preparing to go to Farah, and she would like to know the interpretation of this vision, and here we will refer to the interpretation of the dream of preparation. To attend a joyful event for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is preparing for a joyful event, then here are indications of the good that will happen to her. It also announces her salvation from the worries and problems that she suffered from in her life. This is a sign for divorced women if she sees in her dream that she is preparing for an occasion to start a new life. As for If he has a son of marriageable age, this indicates the approaching date of his marriage. See also: Interpretation of seeing antiquities in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about preparing to attend my brother’s celebration.

title: Interpretation of dreams about the return of my sister’s ex-fiancé in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the return of my sister’s ex-fiancé in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about the return of my sister’s ex-fiancé in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the return of my sister’s ex-fiancé in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing the return of the former preacher may mean that you are thinking about returning to the preacher, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees herself returning to her former fiancé in a dream, this may indicate that she is thinking about her fiancé, and God knows all that. He does not see it. If a single girl sees the return of her ex-fiancé in a dream, this may indicate his desire to return to his fiancée, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my daughter’s ex-fiancé in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my daughter’s ex-fiancé in a dream could indicate the mother’s idea of ​​marrying her daughter, and God I know everything that no one sees. Seeing the daughter’s former fiancé may mean the girl’s wedding is approaching, and God knows everything that no one has seen. If a married woman sees that her daughter is getting married, this may lead to a new job for the daughter, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When she sees the daughter getting married, it could be a sign of overcoming. On problems, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about seeing the father of my ex-fiancé in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the father of my ex-fiancé in a dream. Perhaps a dream about the family of the ex-fiancé indicates the girl’s desire to return to her fiancé, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees the family of her ex-fiancé in a dream, this may mean that the girl is thinking In returning to her fiancé. When you see your ex-fiancé’s family, you can express your meeting with them, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl dreams of a quarrel with her ex-fiancé’s family, this may represent a breakup with them, and God knows all that no one saw. Interpretation of dreams of my ex-fiancé holding my hand in a dream can The interpretation of a dream about my ex-fiancé holding my hand in a dream indicates getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees that her ex-fiancé is holding her hand and smiling in a dream, this may be a sign that she is relieved of stress, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Likewise, seeing her ex-fiancé is holding my hand in a dream. Him holding her hand in a dream may indicate his attachment to his love, and God knows all the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my wife who committed suicide in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my wife who killed herself in a dream may indicate repentance, and God knows all the unseen. If a married man sees his wife committing suicide in a dream, this may be evidence of repentance from Sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a wife killing herself in a dream, this may represent financial crises, and God knows all that we did not see. Also, seeing suicide can indicate psychological crises, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams that someone is harassing me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that someone is harassing me in A dream can lead to prohibited money, and God knows the unseen, as it may indicate obtaining money through illegal means, and God Almighty knows best. If a young man sees in a dream harassment from someone close to him, this may be evidence of bad behavior, and God knows all that he did not see. When you see harassment Of your relatives in a dream this could be evidence of inappropriate things he does

title: Interpretation of a dream about an open wound by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an open wound: The dream has many meanings that indicate good and evil, and it depends on the type of dreamer, whether he is a man or a woman, and what he feels, and we will learn about these interpretations in detail below. Interpretation of a dream about an open wound: The dreamer’s vision of an open wound in his dream, but without blood flowing, symbolizes memories of the past that It still affects him a lot and he cannot forget it. But if you see an open wound in a dream and blood comes out of it, this is an unpleasant sign of betrayal and treachery from the people closest to the dreamer who want to destroy his life. Seeing an open wound in a man’s dream and blood flowing from it indicates crises and disagreements. Which he is currently going through with his family. When a girl sees in her dream that her wound is open and blood is oozing from it, this is a sign of failure in the love relationship that she was living and the dream indicates the unstable life that she is living. Whoever sees an open wound in a dream shows an interest in worldly pleasures and desires and not Controlling it, and the dream is a warning to him not to commit such forbidden things. Interpretation of a dream about an open wound by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing an open wound in the dreamer’s dream as a person who loves the truth and always helps the oppressed and stands by him. The dreamer’s vision of an open wound, but without blood, symbolizes love Good and unrequited help for people. The dreamer seeing an open wound in a dream indicates that he has overcome the crises and problems that plagued his life in the previous period. A dream about a person with an open wound is a sign that he will soon get rid of his enemies, God willing. Seeing an open wound can be in The dream is a sign of debts and material losses that the dreamer will be exposed to during this period. Seeing an open wound with a knife in a dream indicates that the dreamer will expose his faults in front of people and reveal what he was hiding, but if the wound was caused by glass, this is a sign of the dreamer’s arrogant personality. The dreamer of an open wound indicates that a powerful man has wronged him. Also, the dream of a person with an open wound in a dream is an indication of betrayal and treason by some people around him, and the dream shows his feeling of extreme sadness and grief during this time. In the event that one sees in his dream an open wound For a person, this is a sign that this person is experiencing distress and distress and the dreamer must help him. But when the dreamer sees that the open wound is healing, this is an indication of good news and happy events that the dreamer will hear soon, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about an open wound for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees an open wound in The dream indicates that she will marry a young man with good morals and religion in the coming period, God willing. Seeing an open wound without blood in a separated girl’s dream indicates the stability of her life, the happiness that she will enjoy, and the good news that she will hear soon. A girl who sees an open wound in a dream indicates that she will achieve her goals. Soon after suffering and misery. Also, a single woman who dreams of an open wound while she is sad indicates that she is spending a lot of money on things that are of no use.

But when the dreamer sees that the open wound is healing, this is an indication of good news and happy events that the dreamer will hear soon, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about an open wound for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees an open wound in The dream indicates that she will marry a young man with good morals and religion in the coming period, God willing. Seeing an open wound without blood in a separated girl’s dream indicates the stability of her life, the happiness that she will enjoy, and the good news that she will hear soon. A girl who sees an open wound in a dream indicates that she will achieve her goals. Soon after suffering and misery. Also, a single woman who dreams of an open wound while she is sad indicates that she is spending a lot of money on things that are of no use.

title: Interpretation of a mosque in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a mosque in a dream: Learn about the interpretation of a mosque in a dream through today’s encyclopedia article. The mosque is one of the spiritual places where prayer rituals are performed. Once inside, a Muslim feels comfortable and reassured, as it is one of the houses of God Almighty through which he feels His greatness. Although it is one of the most dear places to the soul, many ignore the interpretation of seeing it in a dream and wonder about its meaning. Therefore, through the following lines, we will present to you the interpretation of seeing the mosque in a dream according to what Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book, so follow us. Interpretation of the mosque in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream interpretation scholar, Ibn Sirin, believes that seeing the mosque in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s high position in God Almighty and the great rank that he will attain afterward. That is, God willing. Seeing a mosque with a large number of worshipers is evidence of the wisdom of the dreamer, which makes many people turn to it in times of adversity. If the pilgrims are women, then this dream is a sign of kindness and abundant living that the dreamer will get in reality. The mosque also symbolizes The strength of the relationship between the monarch and his family shows his desire to maintain kinship ties. If the dreamer finds himself in a dream entering the mosque, then his dream is evidence that he has chosen to stay away from sins and disobedience and repent to God Almighty in the near future. But if the mosque is very large and spacious, then this dream Its owner promises that he will go to perform the Hajj, God willing. But if the dreamer dies inside the mosque in a dream, then his dream is evidence that his death is approaching in reality, except that God Almighty will accept his repentance. Ibn Sirin claims that seeing the mats inside the mosque torn or damaged is a warning sign for the individual that he must Return to God Almighty and repent from sins and disobedience. Ibn Sirin adds that mosques without worshipers in a dream are a sign of loss of religion and corruption of morals. Interpretation of the symbol of the mosque in a dream for a single woman: The mosque in a dream for an unmarried girl is a symbol that she will be able to fulfill all the desires that she desires. I dreamed about it in reality. He also promised her that she would have a lot to live for, and that she would hear the good news in the near future. But if she was found sitting in the mosque, this is a sign of the approaching date of her engagement or marriage, God willing, from a pious person whom God is watching over. Interpretation of a mosque in a dream for a married woman. The mosque in a dream for a married woman is evidence On the happiness and joy that will conquer her life, it also promises her to hear the happy news, whether it is pregnancy or the abundant livelihood that she will receive. Also, seeing the mosque in a married woman’s dream is a strong indication that she is responsible and can manage the affairs of her home smoothly. Interpretation of the mosque in a dream for a pregnant woman: The mosque in a dream A pregnant woman is evidence of getting rid of the problems and pain she has been exposed to. It will also have a simple and easy delivery, God willing. If a woman sees that she is building a mosque in a dream, her vision is evidence that she will be blessed with a child who will have a great status and be a wise jurist. Interpretation of a dream about building a mosque Building a mosque in a dream is a sign of goodness that he will gain

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person laughing in a dream?

preview.html: Since seeing the deceased in a complete dream has more than one meaning and more than one interpretation for many scholars, and today on our website we will present to you my experience in interpreting it according to the condition of the dreamer, in addition to mentioning many interpretations based on the interpretation of scholars. What is the interpretation of a dream about the dead laughing? What is the interpretation of a dream about a laughing person? The dead? We begin the interpretation with the scholar Ibn Sirin, who confirms that when a dead person laughs in a dream, it is a complete sign of goodness and can be evidence of his condition in the future, because the dead person is in the abode of truth and we are. They are in the house of falsehood. And when you see that you are telling the deceased about one of your caregivers and you see that the deceased is laughing at you, this is a sign that this is a good thing and that you can now start his work and walk on the path you want. To walk, or at least the path that you told the dead. Perhaps the dead man’s smile or laughter at you is evidence that you will be wrong about something, and it may be evidence that you should consult someone on matters that concern you, and that you cannot make any decision, and God knows best. Seeing the dead laughing with Ibn Sirin. As Ibn Sirin says: When the dead laugh at you in a complete dream and that the deceased is one of your relatives, whether he was a first-degree relative or a distant relative, this is evidence that this person has been forgiven by God Almighty. . . For his sin, and that he now enjoys the afterlife. And when a person sees a dead person in a dream, a perfect person laughing with him and wearing green clothes, this is evidence that the dreamer is righteous in his religion and fears God Almighty in many of the things he does. And when you see a dead person laughing and wearing beautiful, new clothes This is evidence that the dreamer will enjoy a quiet life with his family and God will give him something he does not expect.

title: Interpretation of seeing a villa in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a villa in a dream, houses differ in appearance, beauty and composition, while one of the most luxurious residential homes that can be seen is the villa, as it is considered one of the beautiful and spacious places, it can be characterized by the presence of many rooms in it and the green spaces that fill the trees around it, as well as the presence of a swimming pool in it, as it is considered one of the wonderful places to live in. Interpretation of seeing a villa in a dream The villa can be inhabited by the owners of money and in a famous and famous place in the country, while the villa differs in its design from the other, and also seeing the villa in a dream can bring the viewer many clues and interpretations, including the following: - He pointed out Ibn Sirin's interpretation of the villa door from the outside as one of the signs of good news for the priest. We also mention that seeing the villa is one of the signs of paying off the dreamer's debts. While when he sees the villa, the person who commits sins and problems in his life, it will be a warning of his imprisonment. It should be noted that seeing the villa in a dream can be considered a sign of the merchant's profit. While when the villa is characterized by its large area, it is one of the people who gain status and status in the seer. It was also reported that seeing the palace in a dream The dreamer is characterized by many qualities that bring him closer to God and his love for good deeds. The fortune teller who buys it in the villa can be considered one of the signs of achieving the desired goal. In the event that a single girl sees a villa, it is a sample of many developments in her life in various fields. The presence of an unmarried girl in the villa is considered one of the people to reach what she wants. When a married woman sees it, one of the mortals looks at her for the financial stability that he will enjoy. It is also considered one of the signs of the end of marital problems between the mother and her husband. It should be noted that the villa in a dream refers to a pregnant woman and can be considered one of the signs that indicate that she will give birth to good offspring. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing spoons in a dream by Ibn Sirin Buying a villa in a dream in a dream Many of us may dream of owning a villa and having a beautiful and spacious house with many different rooms in his bed, while buying a villa in a dream in a dream is considered one of the happy people. We mention the most important of them: - It is considered one of the signs that promise the dreamer that he will become rich and enjoy great wealth if he is a man. While the poor person when he sees that he is buying a villa, this is evidence of the abundance of livelihood that he will obtain. If a married woman is seen buying a villa, this indicates her husband’s livelihood and improvement in his financial conditions. Also, buying a villa for a single girl is one of the signs indicating the approach of her marriage. Many commentators explained that seeing the purchase of a villa is one of the good things and happiness for the dreamer. Ibn Shaheen explained that buying a villa is evidence of achieving many achievements and successes in the dreamer’s life. He came to explain this vision as showing financial stability for the visionary. While buying a villa can mean a blessing in the fortune teller’s life. Many interpreters interpreted that the villa, in general, when you see it in a dream,

title: Interpretation of dreams for a mother who gave birth to a boy while she was not pregnant in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about my mother giving birth while she is not pregnant in a dream has more than one interpretation, and the interpretation here differs depending on whether the mother is actually pregnant or not. There is an interpretation of the mother’s age in this dream, and finally, if the mother is alive or dead, the interpretation will differ here, and the dream of childbirth and pregnancy in general is one of those dreams that express pain and sadness. He will learn more about the interpretation of this dream through our article. Follow us. Interpretation of dreams for mother She gives birth to a boy and is not pregnant. Interpretation of a mother’s dream that she is pregnant but is not pregnant. There are many interpretations, such as: If an unmarried girl sees that she has given birth to a boy and is not pregnant, this indicates that the mother needs care and attention. Dreaming of a mother who is not pregnant indicates psychological crises. Which the mother is going through during this period. Dreaming that the mother gave birth to a boy in a dream and she was not pregnant is an indication of a major problem that the mother will face during this time. Seeing a non-pregnant mother giving birth in a dream is a sign of the serious financial crisis that she is going through at this time. Interpretation of a dream in which my wife gave birth to a boy. Interpretation of a wife dreaming that she gave birth to a boy. There are many interpretations, such as: If a married woman dreams that she has given birth to a boy, this is evidence of a lot of kindness and livelihood that she will receive in the coming period. A pregnant woman’s dream that she has given birth to a boy in a dream Evidence that her birth is near and that she will give birth easily. Giving birth to a child in a dream generally indicates joy and happiness. An unmarried girl dreamed that she gave birth to a boy. Interpretation: A girl dreamed that she gave birth to a boy. There are many interpretations, such as: Seeing an unmarried girl who gave birth to a boy in a dream indicates Problems and crises that she will face in the future. Seeing the birth of a boy in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates problems at work or school and their end soon. Dreaming about the birth of an unmarried girl indicates problems and crises that happened to her some time ago and will end soon. Seeing an unmarried girl giving birth to a boy In a dream, it is a sign of her future joys in life. Interpretation of a dream that she gives birth to twins in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about twins has many interpretations, such as: Interpretation of a dream of a married woman giving birth to twins is a sign of her separation from her husband after major problems between them. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is giving birth Twins, this indicates the failure of her emotional relationship, which will suffer in the coming days. Read also: In this article, we learned about the interpretation of my mother’s dream that she gave birth to a son while she was not pregnant in the dream. Dream We hope you have benefited from this article.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surah Al-Muzzammil in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream when seeing or hearing Surat Al-Muzzammil in a dream. Avoid sin and disobedience, as the Qur’an in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate the dreamer’s justice and piety. Day and night, and God Almighty protects him from the hardships of this world and the hereafter, and it was said: He is exposed to misery and fear, then his fear recedes. Interpretation of the dream of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Muzzammil in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Al-Zamil shows his love for the night prayer and reviving it with worship. He may have prayed once at night to remember, but he ignored it. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Muzzammil in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Seeing or hearing Surat Al-Muzzammil and the people who read or recite it will be very good, as the recitation of the Qur’an is in the evening performance. May God protect him from this world and the hardships of the future. It is said that he felt pain and fear, then his fear disappeared. The virtue of Surat Al-Muzzammil in satisfying needs for victory: Whoever writes Surat Al-Muzzammil takes it with him and wins wherever he goes. Facilitating prevention: Reading Surat Al-Muzzammil helps in analyzing the entire action. Know the location of the missing person and return it: If the missing person recites it every day ( Ten days) and the missing person will be found, God willing. Preventing disagreement between spouses: Reciting Surah Al-Muzzammil prevents disagreement between spouses. Alleviating pain: People who wipe away the pain after reading bitter almond oil will recover with God’s help. Satisfying needs and duties: The needy calls for God’s advice and asks for its prayers, then recites Surat Al-Muzzammil.Life: Read this Qur’an every forty days (once) and with God’s help, he will find the ability to survive.The virtue of Surat Al-Muzzammil in marriage.Surat Al-Muzzammil is from Surat Al-Muzzammil in addition to reading near God and achieving good deeds.Surat Al-Muzzammil is the first choice in marriage. There are differences between spouses. Therefore, each of them must read Surat Al-Muzzammil twice and then drink. They become companions and friendly by the command of God Almighty. In the case of not having children, he also has an advantage, so the husband fasts for two days. Make sure to wash it when breaking the fast and drink once to read Surat Al-Muzzammil once. Then, God willing. The birth of a new child. However, many scholars believe that Surat Al-Muzzammil is like the rest of the Holy Qur’an. The benefit of reading is that one gets closer to God by reciting the Qur’an, and attains God’s reward and reward. All of these ideas come from the precedents of some scholars, but in the end there is no worship by reading the Qur’an. . There is no harm. The value of Surat Al-Muzzammil in spendingReading Surat Al-Muzzammil is an important advantage for eliminating needs because a person must read for 10 days a day. And, God willing, these needs will be exhausted, which is also important for those who have to read 40 days a day as a source of livelihood God willing, God willing, as much as God cares about it, it does not count even if it is not proven in the authentic hadith. But the person must continue to recite Surat Al-Muzzammil and other surahs of the Qur’an. Because most of the surahs of the Qur’an contain a large number of huge rewards that can be obtained. upon it from people and deeds. Good, because it has great advantages in eliminating diverse needs, narrow livelihoods, and difficult jobs. Therefore, while waiting for God’s reward, one should continue to engage in recitation
